title: Close to the Edge (CRE222)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In the twenty second episode of our second season, Gary Belsky, Bodger Millerd, Cammi Climaco and Lynn Bixenspan share stories of close calls and brushes with rough stuff.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Gary Belsky, Bodger Millerd, Cammi Climaco, Kevin Allison, Lynn Bixenspan, Bubble Club, Rabbit!, Blood Diamonds, George Shearing, Grouplove, David Crabb, Little Death, Jeff Barr)
